Translations.Text: Niscaya phayasalara dina tadera sabara'i nirdharita samaya.
Yedina kona bandhu'i kona bandhura upakare asabe na ebam tara sahayyaprapta'o habe na.
Tabe allaha yara prati daya karena, tara katha bhinna. Niscaya tini parakramasali dayamaya.
Niscaya yakkuma brksa
papira khadya habe
galita tamrera mata pete phutate thakabe.
Yemana phute pani.
Eke dhara ebam tene niye ya'o jahannamera madhyasthale
atahpara tara mathara upara phutanta panira ayaba dhele da'o
sbada grahana kara, tumi to sam'manita, sambhranta.
E samparke tomara sandehe patita chile.
Niscaya khodabhirura nirapada sthane thakabe
udyanaraji o nirjharinisamuhe.
Tara paridhana karabe cikana o puru resamibastra, mukhomukhi haye basabe.
Erupa'i habe ebam ami taderake anatalocana stri deba.
Tara sekhane santa mane bibhinna phala-mula anate balabe.
Tara sekhane mrtyu asbadana karabe na, prathama mrtyu byatita ebam apanara palanakarta taderake jahannamera ayaba theke raksa karabena.
Apanara palanakartara krpaya eta'i maha saphalya.
Ami apanara bhasaya kora'anake sahaja kare diyechi, yate tara smarana rakhe.
Ata'eba, apani apeksa karuna, tara'o apeksa karache.
